title: FLASHBACK FRIDAY | #29: Human Race Riots
description:
What do you get when you mix 50 years of systemic racism with 30% unemployment, then add in three months of countrywide house arrest for the entire population, and the murder of a black man in broad daylight, right in front of a camera?

You get manufactured race riots that are stoked by the corporate media, you get every possible agenda looking for the oxygen necessary to get their fires started, and the introduction of agent provocateurs that want everything burned to the ground.

The anger is real, but the reactions are being hijacked by social engineers that seek to capitalize on the chaos in order to change society into a new version of reality that includes line-dancing cops, white people kissing black people’s boots, and the glorious reintroduction of the “Roof Koreans” back into the fold. Brace yourself because we’re only halfway through 2020 and it shows no signs of going back to the way things were.
